text: Nada Vilotijević (; born July 8, 1953) is a Serbian University professor at Teacher Training Faculty in Belgrade (University of Belgrade) and author. She works and resides in Belgrade, Serbia, and has published over 10 books. She is married to Mladen Vilotijević with whom she has one son, Viktor Vilotijević. ==See also== *Vilotijević ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:20th-century Serbian people Category:Serbian academics Category:Serbian writers Category:People from Vrbas, Serbia Category:Serbian educators Category:Serbian women writers
title: Nada Vilotijević
